body:
"Don't be sad because you're saying Goodbye, You should be happy, Because you'll have memories with them that you'll cherish forever." Hey everybody. Today I made a hard but easy decision. >> I might not be on Avicus or Minecraft for a long time soon. The game is just getting really boring and so is the server. I had a lot of good things go on the game and such but I think its time for me to move on to other things. I have school and big tests and projects coming up. I also haven't getting a proper sleep time. Instead of 8 hours I would now usually get 6-7 which isn't good. Plus everyone I know stopped playing it. I'm better at other games as well like CoD, Just Cause, and others. On the weekends when I have nothing to do I just play Minecraft all day and have no fun. I hope you guys understand. I'm not sure when I'm going to leave but, its soon, probably in 2-3 days. I want to thank everyone on Avicus for letting me play and have fun for the past 3 years. Some people I want to thank personally are; Danii, armoredpotato, Nebbsy, Nemo, GBeanzy, IzikW, maxweberh, Tigger_the_bear, Nanoo, DeliciousShoesHD, SirCyaniide, SoccerMaster, FutbolHunter, Clijmart and Kojapan17. You all have been loyal friends to me through the ride. There are many more but I couldn't list everyone. I will miss everyone on the server. Minecraft was good but it's for the best if I move on.

Cya

-Parker

title: Goodbye. Moving on.
